seed_pair.known: I wouldn't have said it in exactly the same way.
seed_pair.target: 我不会用完全相同的方式说它。

practice_phrases: I wouldn't have said it.
我不会说它。
I wouldn't have said it soon.
我不会很快说它。
I wouldn't have said it if I knew.
如果我知道我不会说它。
I wouldn't have said it to you earlier.
我不会之前对你说它。
She was kind, so I wouldn't have said it.
她很友好，所以我不会说它。
I wouldn't have said it when she was feeling nervous.
当她感到紧张时我不会说它。
I was hoping you would understand why I wouldn't have said it.
我希望你会理解为什么我不会说它。
I wouldn't have said it because that wasn't what I wanted.
我不会说它因为那不是我想要的。
If I had known what you wanted, I wouldn't have said it differently.
如果我知道你想要什么，我不会做得不同地说它。
I wouldn't have said it in exactly the same way.
我不会用完全相同的方式说它。
Say it.
说它。
Say it soon.
很快说它。
Can you say it?
你能说它吗？
I hope you'll say it soon.
我希望你很快说它。
She was very kind when she tried to say it.
当她试图说它时，她非常友好。
He wasn't very patient when I couldn't say it.
当我不能说它时，他不是很耐心。
Can you tell me what your name is when you say it?
当你说它时你能告诉我你的名字是什么吗？
I was hoping you would say it in exactly the same way.
我希望你会用完全相同的方式说它。
If I had known what you wanted, I would have helped you say it.
如果我知道你想要什么，我会帮助你说它。
I wouldn't have said it in exactly the same way.
我不会用完全相同的方式说它。
Exactly the same way.
完全相同的方式。
In exactly the same way.
用完全相同的方式。
That's exactly the same way.
那是完全相同的方式。
She did it in exactly the same way.
她用完全相同的方式做它。
I hope you'll finish in exactly the same way.
我希望你用完全相同的方式完成。
He wasn't very patient, but he did it in exactly the same way.
他不是很耐心，但他用完全相同的方式做它。
Can you tell me if you would do it in exactly the same way?
你能告诉我你会用完全相同的方式做它吗？
I was hoping she would say it in exactly the same way as earlier.
我希望她会用和之前完全相同的方式说它。
If I had known what you wanted, I would have done it in exactly the same way.
如果我知道你想要什么，我会用完全相同的方式做它。
I wouldn't have said it in exactly the same way.
我不会用完全相同的方式说它。
In exactly the same way.
用完全相同的方式。
Say it in exactly the same way.
用完全相同的方式说它。
I hope in exactly the same way.
我希望用完全相同的方式。
Can you do it in exactly the same way?
你能用完全相同的方式做它吗？
She tried to say it in exactly the same way.
她试图用完全相同的方式说它。
He wasn't very patient when I did it in exactly the same way.
当我用完全相同的方式做它时，他不是很耐心。
I was hoping you would finish it in exactly the same way soon.
我希望你很快会用完全相同的方式完成它。
That wasn't what I was hoping would happen in exactly the same way.
那不是我希望会用完全相同的方式发生的事。
If I had known what you wanted, I would have done it in exactly the same way.
如果我知道你想要什么，我会用完全相同的方式做它。
I wouldn't have said it in exactly the same way.
我不会用完全相同的方式说它。
